metadata.title: Chibaraf - Sustainable Agriculture Solutions
metadata.description: Leading sustainable agriculture in Africa through innovative farming, storage, transformation and export solutions.
metadata.ogDescription: Sustainable farming solutions from field to export

hero.title: Innovative Agricultural Solutions
hero.subtitle: We transform agriculture through sustainable practices and innovative solutions

about.title: Leader in Sustainable Agriculture
about.description: We are pioneers in developing sustainable agricultural solutions in Africa. Our approach combines proven traditional practices with modern innovations.
about.metaDescription: Chibaraf — inspiring sustainable agriculture through creativity, community and care.
about.missionText: Our mission is to produce nutritious food while protecting ecosystems and empowering smallholders.
about.visionText: We envision systems that regenerate land, nourish people and inspire the next generation of farmers.

regenerative.title: Regenerative Farming
regenerative.desc: Techniques that restore soil, increase biodiversity and yield healthier produce.

innovation.title: Innovative Ideas
innovation.desc: We blend tradition with innovation to design solutions that scale sustainably.

community.title: Community First
community.desc: We work with local partners and customers to build resilient food systems.

services.title: What We Offer
services.description: Comprehensive solutions from production to export

production.title: Production
production.desc: From seedlings to harvest, we manage every step with care to deliver high-quality, sustainable crops.

storage.title: Storage
storage.desc: We provide safe and modern facilities for the preservation of raw products after harvest.

transformation.title: Transformation
transformation.desc: Our transformation units convert raw materials into finished products ready for consumption.

export.title: Exportation
export.desc: We proudly export agricultural products across West Africa — and soon to Europe.

hero.title: From seed to shipment — built on quality, traceability and impact
hero.text: Chibaraf provides hands-on production support, secure storage, value-adding transformation and reliable exportation — designed to grow farm incomes and assure buyers.

deepDive.subtitle: Deep Dive
deepDive.title: What each service means for farmers and buyers
deepDive.text: Practical descriptions and outcomes — so partners know exactly what Chibaraf delivers at each stage of the value chain.

production.title: Production
production.text: We support nursery management, planting schedules, pest management and harvest optimization. Our agronomists work with producers to increase yield, improve quality and adopt regenerative practices.

storage.title: Storage
storage.text: Post-harvest handling and modern storage reduce loss and protect value. We provide temperature-aware handling, pest control and traceable storage systems.

transformation.title: Transformation
transformation.text: We add value through processing units that convert raw goods into market-ready products — improving margins for producers and reliability for buyers.

exportation.title: Exportation
exportation.text: We manage export logistics, compliance and buyer relations to ensure products arrive in excellent condition and meet all regulations.

cta.title: Ready to engage?
cta.text: Tell us which service you need and we'll propose a clear plan and pricing.

team.title: Agricultural Experts
